medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in her usual state of good health until 3pm on the day of admission, when she developed rapid-onset sweating and constant (non-fluctuating) epigastric pain that radiated to her back. Coincident with the onset of pain, she reports new-onset nausea and 1 episode of non-bloody vomiting. The pain was severe enough that she was immediately driven to the hospital.
medical_history.family_history: Patient's mother had a cerebrovascular accident (CVA); father had diabetes mellitus (DM), hypertension (HTN), and died of alcoholism; two brothers have a history of alcoholism.
medical_history.social_history: Chronic alcohol intake of unspecified number of drinks per day.
